title: Is it permissible to put Henna design on the back of the hand? #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: is it permissible to use henna on the back of the hand I mean b there's no problem in doing that for girls for women providing that they don't show their hands to nonah men whether it's on the palm or on the back of the hand or on the feet there's no problem in doing that at all
